casebody.data:
George Weinhagen, Jr., Administrator of Estate of Albert Weinhagen, Deceased, Appellee, v. City of Herrin, Appellant.

(Abstract of Decision.)

Heard in this court at October term, 1939;opinion filed March 9, 1940.Lan Haney and E. N. Bowen, for appellant; Gold & McCann, Costigan & Wollrab and C. Ross Reynolds, for appellee; J. E. Porter and Walter A. Yoder, of counsel. Opinion by Presiding Justice Stone.

“Not to be published in full.”
